ChrisTV PVR Professional v5.30 + Serial

ChrisTV PVR Professional is the PVR that takes control over your TV card. TV on your PC with high quality image and sound. Supports all TV cards based on BT8x8 chipset, Philips SAA713x chipset, Conexant CX2388x, and TV Cards with MPEG hardware encoder. Hauppauge PVR series, Leadtek PVR2000, ATI Ehome wonder, and also works with any capture device like Web cams and graphic cards. Features include: Multi-tuner support, TimeShifting, support for Vista, AVI recording using any audio/video codecs, advanced recording settings, advanced scheduler, recording profiles, radio FM support, channel autoscan with fine tuning, support for dscaler deinterlace direct show filter, and zoom feature.

Version 5.3 can broadcast your favorite TV shows, Movies, radio stations to your friends through local networks and through Internet, ChrisTV Broadcast feature offers 3 modes for your broadcast such as, Video & Audio, Video only, Audio only, and we have improved support for Microsoft Windows Vista and Microsoft Windows Vista SP1.
